title: User Login Success
description: Verify user can log in successfully with valid credentials via Supabase authentication.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Confirm user is redirected to the home dashboard.
Verify session is persisted and user remains logged in after page reload.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Validate the system rejects invalid login credentials and shows relevant error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify the login attempt fails.
Check an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.

title: Markdown Editor Basic Editing and Saving
description: Ensure that users can create, edit, and save Markdown documents with proper UI feedback.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to the Markdown Editor.
Create a new Markdown document.
Type Markdown content including headers, lists, and links.
Verify the GFM style formatting renders correctly in the preview pane.
Use the quick formatting toolbar to format text (bold, italic, code).
Confirm the document structure navigation panel correctly reflects document headings.
Save the document.
Verify the document is saved in local storage under Markdown storage key.
Reload the page and load the saved Markdown document.
Ensure the document content loads correctly and all formatting persists.

title: LaTeX Editor Render, Symbol Palette and Export
description: Validate LaTeX document editing, symbol palette usage, bibliography management, and PDF export functionality.

steps.description: Log in and open LaTeX Studio.
Create a new LaTeX document.
Insert LaTeX commands manually and via the symbol palette.
Check rendering updates dynamically in the split view.
Add bibliography entries using the bibliography management tool.
Confirm bibliography is correctly displayed in the rendered document.
Export the document as PDF.
Verify the generated PDF is accurate, includes all content and formatted symbols.
Save the LaTeX document.
Ensure saved data persists and reloads correctly.

title: Mermaid Live Diagram Creation and Export
description: Test creating diagrams with interactive zoom/pan, applying templates, and exporting diagrams as SVG and PNG.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to Mermaid Live.
Create a new Mermaid diagram using a type-specific template.
Edit diagram code and verify canvas updates in real-time.
Use zoom and pan controls on the diagram canvas.
Confirm zoom and pan respond smoothly.
Export the diagram as SVG format.
Verify exported SVG is high-resolution and accurate.
Export the diagram as PNG format.
Confirm PNG output matches the diagram canvas in quality.
Save the Mermaid diagram.
Ensure the diagram is saved to local storage and reloads correctly.

title: JSON Prompt Builder Drag & Drop and Block Management
description: Verify that users can assemble, edit, and save JSON prompts using drag & drop blocks and form inputs.

steps.description: Log in and open the JSON Prompt Builder.
Add prompt blocks from the library by drag and drop into the assembly area.
Fill form inputs within blocks to customize JSON properties.
Verify block assembly reflects a valid JSON structure in real-time.
Rearrange blocks using drag and drop.
Ensure the JSON structure updates accordingly without errors.
Save the constructed JSON prompt.
Confirm the JSON prompt is stored locally and can be reloaded intact.

title: Document Repository Save, Load, and Delete Documents
description: Test reliable save, retrieve, and deletion operations for user documents across all editors with local storage isolation.

steps.description: Log in and create or open documents in any editor (Markdown, LaTeX, Mermaid, JSON).
Save documents to the repository.
Verify documents are saved under the correct tool-specific storage keys.
List saved documents in the document repository UI.
Check all documents appear with correct metadata.
Load saved documents back into their respective editors.
Confirm content loads accurately without data loss.
Delete selected documents from the repository.
Ensure documents are removed from local storage and no longer available in UI.

title: AI Assistant Interaction and Chat History Persistence
description: Validate that the AI assistant 'Textie' provides responsive help, maintains context awareness, and retains chat history.

steps.description: Log in and open any editor.
Invoke the AI assistant 'Textie'.
Enter queries or commands to the AI assistant.
Verify assistant responds with relevant, context-aware answers.
Continue conversation with multiple messages.
Confirm chat history is maintained within the session.
Reload the application.
Verify chat history persists after reload and previous messages remain visible.

title: Settings Update: Theme Configuration and Immediate Application
description: Verify users can change the application theme from the settings page and that changes apply immediately and persist on reload.

steps.description: Log in and open the global settings page.
Change the theme setting to a different option.
Confirm the new theme is applied immediately to the entire application UI.
Reload the application.
Verify the selected theme persists and loads correctly.

title: Settings Update: Data Backup and Restore
description: Ensure backup and restore functionality correctly saves and reintegrates user workspace data including documents and preferences.

steps.description: Log in and open the settings page.
Trigger a data backup to export current workspace data.
Verify the backup file contains accurate and complete data.
Perform changes to documents and preferences.
Restore workspace data from the previously saved backup file.
Confirm all documents and settings revert back to backup state without data loss.

title: Application UI Responsiveness Across Various Devices
description: Test that the application UI adapts and performs well on multiple screen sizes and device types including desktop and mobile browsers.

steps.description: Open the application on desktop browser at standard resolutions.
Verify UI layout is consistent, usable, and visually correct.
Open the application on tablet and mobile device emulators.
Confirm UI components resize, collapse, or reorganize appropriately for smaller screens.
Perform common actions (login, document editing, AI assistant usage) on mobile.
Ensure performance is acceptable and no functional regressions exist.

title: Unauthorized Access Restriction
description: Verify that all editor pages and document repositories are inaccessible without authentication and redirect to the login page.

steps.description: Open a new browser session without login.
Attempt to access Markdown Editor URL directly.
Confirm redirection to login page.
Attempt to access LaTeX Studio URL directly.
Confirm redirection to login page.
Try accessing JSON Prompt Builder and Mermaid Live pages similarly.
Ensure access is denied and login prompt shown.

title: Logout Functionality
description: Ensure users can log out successfully, clearing session and redirecting to login page.

steps.description: Log in successfully.
Click the logout button or link.
Verify user session is cleared.
Confirm redirection to login page occurs.
Attempt to access protected tools after logout.
Ensure access is denied and login page is shown.

title: Error Handling: Document Load Failure
description: Validate that the system gracefully handles scenarios where loading a saved document fails or data is corrupted.

steps.description: Manually corrupt saved document data in local storage.
Attempt to load corrupted document in any editor.
Verify user is informed of the loading failure with a clear error message.
Check that the application does not crash and the user can continue normal operations.
